bug_report.summary: Application crashes upon clicking the SAVE button while creating a new user

stepsToReproduce.step2: Navigate to the Users Menu -> New User
stepsToReproduce.step3: Filled out all the user information fields
stepsToReproduce.step5: Seen an error page “ORA1090 Exception: Insert values Error…”
stepsToReproduce.step6: See the attached logs for more information (Attach more logs related to the bug..IF any)

bug_report.expectedResult: On clicking the SAVE button, you should be prompted to a successful message “New User has been created successfully”
